acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Guddu Gupta is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date.            Copy is furnished to him. Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of the both sides as well as case diary I find ground for presuming that the accused person committed the offence under sections 448/323 of the IPC/ 18 of the POCSO Act read with section 4 of the POCSO Act and accordingly charges are framed. The particular of the offences charged is duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summons to PWs.           Seen the bail petition filed by the accused praying for allowing him to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition. Heard learned lawyers of the both sides. Perused the case record. Considering all aspects the bail prayer is allowed. Accordingly the accused person Shri Guddu Gupta is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 15,000/- with a local surety of like amount.           Fixing 27.09.2019 for evidence.
Accused Guddu Gupta is present.       PWs absent. Summons not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.            Fixing 20.11.2019 for Evidence.
accused present.PWs absent. summon not yet returned. Issue fresh

Present- Sri Kalyanjit Saikia(AJS)Addl. Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu   Case record is received from Honble Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.   Accused is present.   PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.

accd Guddu Gupta present,       PWs absent, summons issued to Victim returned unserved with a prayer to fix another date, prayer is allowed. re-issue the same.       also issue summon to the informant.
